original_text: So David set out, and the six hundred men who were with him, and they came to the brook Besor, where those who were left behind stayed.
korean_text: 이에 다윗과 또 그와 함께 한 육백 명이 가서 브솔 시내에 이르러 뒤떨어진 자를 거기 머물게 했으되

sentences.original_text: and the six hundred men who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 육백 명도 함께했습니다

sentences.original_text: and they came to the brook Besor
where those who were left behind stayed
